short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Binge Easy allows you to binge watch your favourite shows/videos on Youtube / Netflix / Prime by skipping ads and themeIntros

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aren't we all tired of skipping those irritating Ads on Youtube or those theme songs of your favourite TV serials. Well, Binge Easy is here to rescue you. 

Beware BingeEasy makes you lazy ! 

To confirm if BingeEasy is installed, watch any video on youtube and check for the change in window title.

For suggestions or bugs , feel free to contact me on my email  : arvi.iyengar@gmail.com
